physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 38.7°C, Blood Pressure: 119/79 mm Hg, Pulse: 112 bpm, Weight: 27.2 kg, Height: 123.8 cm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Discoloration below the right eye; abdomen soft and nontender with normal bowel sounds; firm mass in the lower midline; periumbilical bruising; external rotation of the right hip caused flinching; slight limp.
Moderate cervical lymphadenopathy; right tibial tuberosity was slightly tender; otherwise normal examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pain resolved within a few days

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Swelling and discoloration developed the day before admission.
